name: Code Flask Back End Webhook Agent
shortDescription: Integrates the /webhook endpoint into the Flask backend based on the provided template.
fullDescription: This agent enhances the existing Flask backend by implementing a webhook endpoint according to a predefined structure. It ensures that the system can handle and process variable events triggered after a user initiates a checkout, maintaining consistent backend communication flows.
UseCases:
1. Receive and process checkout events from payment systems or services.
2. Expand Flask applications with webhook-driven integrations.
3. Automate backend responses based on external event triggers.
